short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to detect & block Javascript based coin mining links

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Qualys CoinBlocker extension enables blocking of browser based coin-mining attacks. Along with blacklisting & whitelisting of domains, it also supports advanced javascript scanning to identify & block malicious javascript functions. Extension can also identify & block malicious coin mining advertisements loaded inside iframe by third party ads.
